<!-- To import this information into a WordPress blog follow these steps. -->
<!-- 1. Log into that blog as an administrator. -->
<!-- 2. Go to Tools: Import in the blog's admin panels (or Manage: Import in older versions of WordPress). -->
<!-- 3. Choose "WordPress" from the list. -->
<!-- 4. Upload this file using the form provided on that page. -->
<!-- 5. You will first be asked to map the authors in this export file to users -->
<!--    on the blog.  For each author, you may choose to map to an -->
<!--    existing user on the blog or to create a new user -->
<!-- 6. WordPress will then import each of the posts, comments, and categories -->
<!--    contained in this file into your blog -->

	<wp:tag><wp:tag_slug>xmas</wp:tag_slug><wp:tag_name><![CDATA[xmas]]></wp:tag_name></wp:tag>
		<item>
<title>Updates and traffic</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?p=158</link>
<pubDate>Thu, 01 Jan 1970 01:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?p=158</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[First off, a warm welcome to the people coming in from Little Gamers! I noticed a 150% increase in visitors since they linked me in their post about guestcomics, so thanks for dropping by. It's always nice to see new people.
On a somewhat related note, I decided to push my update schedule a bit. For the longest time I updated sporadically, then settled to
As I mentioned in the last blogpost, I was reading ‘How to make webcomics’ and the book really came along when I needed it. I've been struggling with my creative side and what career (if any) I want to build for myself. This, to those who know me, doesn't come as a surprise. Doubt is a big constant in my life. But what I do know is that I like drawing and from the multitude of areas where one use this skill, comics is the most important one in my life. ]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>158</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2008-12-04 20:36:41</wp:post_date>

<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

enjoy the comics!]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>Filler #01</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2007/06/13/filler-01/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 13 Jun 2007 20:20:42 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2007/06/13/filler-01/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[There's not much to show yet (comic-wise that is), so I bring you my first piece of filler-art!
I know, I know, I should be kicked for that. But I did finally get <a href="http://www.mindbase21.be">my main website</a> finished (yay!) and really, this drawing is just too awesome not to share. Been holding it back for a couple of months, so what better place and time to show it then in the here and now.]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>011 - For rent</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2007/06/20/for-rent/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 20 Jun 2007 19:37:44 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2007/06/20/for-rent/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[You wouldn't believe the weird phone-calls I've had the past 2 weeks.

This week's comic was drawn with my Wacom in Illustrator, that's a first for me. I think the linework turned out quite nice, maybe I'll experiment with it some more. (I'll need a better sketch to start from though.)]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>012 - Keeping in line</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2007/07/14/012-keeping-in-line/</link>
<pubDate>Sat, 14 Jul 2007 21:10:24 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2007/07/14/012-keeping-in-line/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Waiting in line at the checkout, it's boring as hell. Until someone gets a hold of the microphone. Instant fun!
I loved the idea for this comic, but I'm afraid the setting doesn't come across very clearly. Oh well, draw and learn, right?]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

<content:encoded><![CDATA[A new lay-out, to fit your web-viewing needs. After some experimenting, I've decided on this horizontal lay-out in stead of the vertical. Gives me more room to work with and the site will look better (eventually). Unless you're on a 800x600 monitor. In which case you're screwed either way.]]></content:encoded>

<title>015 - Holiday cheers</title>

<pubDate>Mon, 24 Dec 2007 19:01:47 +0000</pubDate>

<item>
<title>016 - Little seeds, big trouble</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?attachment_id=77</link>
<pubDate>Mon, 07 Jan 2008 22:29:56 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/comics/2008-01-07.gif</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>

<pubDate>Mon, 21 Jan 2008 21:23:29 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/01/21/new-design/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>If you visited the site recently, you might have noticed some strange behaviour. Nothing to be alarmed about, I'm just updating the new design. Hence, I won't be posting a new comic this week.</p><p>If you come across any bugs, don't hesitate to tell me or send a screenshot. I'd be much obliged.</p>
]]></content:encoded>

<title>Another me: papercraft models</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/01/28/another-me-papercraft-models/</link>
<pubDate>Mon, 28 Jan 2008 21:01:55 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="papercraft"><![CDATA[papercraft]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/01/28/another-me-papercraft-models/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[I felt like doing a bit of papercraft this weekend, so I made the comicversion of myself. Hope you like it.
If you'd like to assemble them yourself, you can download the pdf's of the models right here:

<a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/downloads/papercraft/another_me-A.pdf" target="_blank">Another me, v.A</a>
<a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/downloads/papercraft/another_me-B.pdf" target="_blank">Another me, v.B</a>]]></content:encoded>

<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Just lots of trial and error I guess. I've been making paper things since forever. I'm happy to hear you like them. Maybe I could put up some blank templates soon, and people could put their own designs on them. I'd like to see how that would turn out.
If you'd like to see more papercraft, I'd recomend checking out <a href="http://paperforest.blogspot.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paperforest</a>, there's tons of great models on that site.]]></wp:comment_content>

<item>
<title>Another me: papercraft models</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/01/28/another-me-papercraft-models-2/</link>
<pubDate>Mon, 28 Jan 2008 21:04:07 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/01/28/another-me-papercraft-models-2/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>I felt like doing a bit of papercraft this weekend, so I made the comicversion of myself. Hope you like it.<br />
If you'd like to assemble them yourself, you can download the pdf's of the models right here:</p>
<p><a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/downloads/papercraft/another_me-A.pdf" target="_blank">Another me, v.A</a><br />
<a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/downloads/papercraft/another_me-B.pdf" target="_blank">Another me, v.B</a></p>

]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>017 - An indecisive mind</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/02/03/017-an-indecisive-mind/</link>
<pubDate>Sun, 03 Feb 2008 18:44:43 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[creating]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="creating"><![CDATA[creating]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[indecision]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="indecision"><![CDATA[indecision]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[mind]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="mind"><![CDATA[mind]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[stuff]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="stuff"><![CDATA[stuff]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/02/03/017-an-indecisive-mind/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[The key is actually just getting to work. The more energy you put in, the less you're mind wanders off on these things.]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>89</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2008-02-03 20:44:43</wp:post_date>

<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Thanks man, I'm actually tempted to explore this stylefurther. It's a real time-saver.
The note-book idea is great.I find I also get some nice ideas when I'm not trying for it. Just doodling things or taking a walk seems to do the trick. I have a hard time accepting that though. I'm a bit obsessive when I want to get work done, so letting it rest is challenging.]]></wp:comment_content>

<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[I really like how you switched up your style for this comic. You should always allow for time to work and time to think. Generally I come up with ideas during sleep or while driving, which is why I have a notebook next to my bed and one in my car. Of course, I have other notebooks all over the place, just in case. You never know what your muse will be and when it will come about.]]></wp:comment_content>

<item>
<title>Filler - Kismet</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/02/19/filler-kismet/</link>
<pubDate>Tue, 19 Feb 2008 18:39:13 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[poster]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="poster"><![CDATA[poster]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/02/19/filler-kismet/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[There's been an unofficial bi-weekly update schedule going on here, but I'll have to interrupt it up again. Hopefully I'll get something done by the end of the week. Until then, here's something I've been working on. It's an ink-drawing I used for a poster. You've got a exclusive preview on your screen now, since only myself and the director of the play have seen it so far. I'll post the finished piece on <a href="http://www.mindbase21.blogspot.com" target="_blank">my blog</a> next week.]]></content:encoded>

<title>018 - Silent horror</title>

<item>
<title>Update schedule</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/03/11/update-schedule/</link>
<pubDate>Tue, 11 Mar 2008 12:53:28 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/03/11/update-schedule/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>I know, I know, my comic-updates have been rather erratic so far. But we're in for a change, you and I. Since I'm very much a list-person, I decided to finally add these updates as a "to-do" on my calendar.  Of course that doesn't mean much to you. It's not like there's someone standing behind me with a baseball bat to keep me in line, right? However, I have every intent at keeping to my list. I'm starting off easy with a bi-weekly update. Something I've been doing for the last couple of months anyway. And as a back-up, for when I'm on vacation, or otherwise unable to post, I'll make sure to let you guys know (including a slacker-image).</p>
<p>So, keep an eye on the site, and give a shout (profanity allowed) if I were to forget. </p>
<p><strong>Updates will be every other Wednesdaynight, CET+1, </strong>starting this week.</p>
]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>94</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2008-03-11 14:53:28</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2008-03-11 12:53:28</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>update-schedule</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>_edit_lock</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>1228418610</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>1</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:comment>
<wp:comment_id>518</wp:comment_id>

<title>020 - Out of office</title>

<pubDate>Tue, 25 Mar 2008 12:38:25 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>It's a day early and I've got a little something extra, this must be your lucky day! As a feature for todays comic, I've made a mulitmedia version as well. For the full effect , make sure to turn up the volume of your speakers</p>
<p><a href="extra/"><img src="http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/comics/2008-03-25.thumbnail.jpg" /></a></p>

<title>021 - A typical Conversation</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/04/09/021-a-typical-conversation/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 09 Apr 2008 21:21:36 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>022 - The usual suspects</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/04/23/022-the-usual-suspects/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 23 Apr 2008 18:35:03 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[hair]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="hair"><![CDATA[hair]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[id]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="id"><![CDATA[id]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[looks]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="looks"><![CDATA[looks]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[mugshots]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="mugshots"><![CDATA[mugshots]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[pictures]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="pictures"><![CDATA[pictures]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/04/23/022-the-usual-suspects/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Mugshots. No, actually, these are based on various id-pictures taken through the years. Funny stuff. <span class="strike">I'm tempted to scan a whole bunch of them. Maybe by the next update.</span><a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/wp-content/uploads/2008/04/id-pics.jpg" title="id pictures" target="_blank">Look here.</a> I'm missing some essential shots, unfortunately. Like the mullet. Embrassing stuff none the less. The last one is from last week, taken with my iSight.</p>
<p>I'm thinking about making a mini-comic or a zine with a selection of the webcomics + unseen ones. Throw in a couple of pinups perhaps. I don't think I have enough visitors to add a fullblown store to the site, but perhaps a page with some ordering info would be useful? I'm asking you, faithful visitor, for your opinion. (You know, the 3 of you.) Would you be interested in this?</p>
]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>Help a comicker in need </title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/04/24/help-a-comicker-in-need/</link>
<pubDate>Thu, 24 Apr 2008 17:39:33 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[dentist]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="dentist"><![CDATA[dentist]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[mouth]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="mouth"><![CDATA[mouth]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[rachel]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="rachel"><![CDATA[rachel]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[subculture]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="subculture"><![CDATA[subculture]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[teeth]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="teeth"><![CDATA[teeth]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[wonky]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="wonky"><![CDATA[wonky]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/04/24/help-a-comicker-in-need/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>I live in a place where people are lucky enough to have descent social security and medical/dental work is affordable. So from this privileged position, I'd like to help a fellow artist in need. Rachel needs to have heavy dental work done and it will costs her a fortune. Check out her site and donate something. There's some fun insentives as well.</p>
<p><a href="http://www.subcultureofone.com/teeth/" target="_blank"><img src="http://www.subcultureofone.com/teeth/links/rachelwonkymouth468x60.jpg" alt="Fix Rachel's Wonky Mouth" /></a></p>
]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

<item>
<title>023 - Eyecatcher</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/05/07/023-eyecatcher/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 07 May 2008 18:05:50 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[dust]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="dust"><![CDATA[dust]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[eye]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="eye"><![CDATA[eye]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[fly]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="fly"><![CDATA[fly]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/05/07/023-eyecatcher/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Why is the right arm contorted like that? I like to think it's an expression of pain, but it could be I just didn't bother with realism.<br />
Also, I started a webcomics-guide on my blog. Weekly updates, <a href="http://mindbase21.blogspot.com/search/label/review" target="_blank">go check it out.</a></p>
]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>025 - False alarm</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/07/01/025-false-alarm/</link>
<pubDate>Tue, 01 Jul 2008 17:57:51 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/?p=117</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>At long last, a new comic. And an educational one, none the less. Well, sort of.</p><p>I'll be doing some updates on the site this month, so don't freak out if things look a little messy.</p>

]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>117</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2008-07-01 18:57:51</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2008-07-01 17:57:51</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>025-false-alarm</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>

<title>026 - The Darkest Knight</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/07/31/07312008/</link>

<item>
<title>029 - Foiled</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/08/28/029-foiled/</link>
<pubDate>Thu, 28 Aug 2008 17:58:01 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/?p=133</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>And so this accidental 5-part story-arc comes to a close. A personal footnote that probably doen't make much sense, but honestly, you shouldn't expect that from an online comic. Go read Achewood or Sam and Fuzzy. That's the stuff that counts.<br />
See you in 2 weeks.</p>
<a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/2008/07/21/filler-2/">Read the beginning</a>
]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>030 - Intermission</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/09/10/030-intermission/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 10 Sep 2008 10:22:06 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/?p=139</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>I'm on vacation, free to release my destructive tendencies on others then my co-workers. Now if you'll excuse me, I shall lay motionless on the ground for the rest of the week.</p>
<p>Also, the title of the webcomic will change with every new comic from now on. This is to reflect the sheer insanity that runs my daily life.</p>
]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>033 - Chosen One</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/11/05/033-chosen-one/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 05 Nov 2008 19:29:26 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/?p=147</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[First off: hooray USA for using your common sense. Third time's a charm.
The comic's a double feature because I didn't keep up my 2-weekly schedule (I should be flogged, I know). I should note that it's been compaired to the first 2 seasons of Lost, in the way that nothing seems to be happening. And this double feature is no different! Can't blame me for being inconsistent.
That being said, I'm not planning on keeping this up for 60+ episodes. One of these weeks this experiment will come to an end and I'll focus on something else for a while. Who knows, I might actually write a few storylines.]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

<item>
<title>On making webcomics</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/12/01/guestcomic-2/</link>
<pubDate>Mon, 01 Dec 2008 22:38:24 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[guestcomics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="guestcomics"><![CDATA[guestcomics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[littlegamers]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="littlegamers"><![CDATA[littlegamers]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[webcomics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="webcomics"><![CDATA[webcomics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/mic/?p=152</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>If you read the comic ‘<a href="http://www.little-gamers.com/" target="_blank">Little Gamers</a>’ every once in a while, you may have noticed it's their 8th year birthday this week. And because Madsen is <a href="http://www.little-gamers.com/2008/12/01/8-years/"  target="_blank">a lazy bum</a>, they're running guestcomics all week. Including one by me on Saturday.<br />
So, you know, read ‘<a href="http://www.little-gamers.com/"  target="_blank">Little Gamers</a>’ this Saturday and come back here to tell me what you think of the comic.<br />
Don't worry, I'll remind you all of it on Saturday as well.</p>
<p>On another note, I'm reading ‘How to make webcomics’, by the guys from Halfpixel (that being the guys behind <a href="http://www.pvponline.com"  target="_blank">PVP</a>, <a href="http://sheldoncomics.com"  target="_blank">Sheldon</a>, <a href="http://www.evil-comic.com/"  target="_blank">Evil Inc.</a> and <a href="http://www.starslipcrisis.com/"  target="_blank">Starslipcrisis</a>). Despite its 195 pages, it reads fast. Mostly because the type is large and there's lot's of strips &#038; examples inbetween text.<br />
The layout is a little chaotic though. Lots of extra blocks with tips and explanations crossing the normal flow of the chapters. It throws me off sometimes and I lose focus off what I'm actually reading.<br />
But forgetting that, I'm halfway through and I find it quite an interesting book.  They cover the 'making of' from tips on character-development, through writing, to getting it online and building your audience. I haven't gotten to the branding and monetizing part yet, but it looks promising.<br />
Like they say in the introduction: most of this is common sense and so you'll pick up the bits you hadn't thought of before and throw away the rest. These guys speak from experience so you (me?) will have a headstart and know what you're getting into. that's probably the best way to view it, not as a step-by-step manual but as a guide. With that in mind, it's an interesting read for anyone interested in webcomics and setting up an online business with creative work in mind.</p>
<p>Cheers all.</p>
]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>152</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2008-12-01 23:38:24</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2008-12-01 22:38:24</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>guestcomic-2</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>_edit_lock</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>1228566504</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>1</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
<item>
<title>035 - Warm thoughts</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/12/03/035-warm-thoughts/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 03 Dec 2008 20:02:53 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[cold]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="cold"><![CDATA[cold]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[work]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="work"><![CDATA[work]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?p=155</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>After all the madness of the previous storyline, I thought I'd do a few journal comics. This one is mostly wishful thinking. There's no insulation at work, so heating is difficult and expensive in winter. The bathroom's got a decent heater though.</p>
]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

<wp:comment>
<wp:comment_id>1875</wp:comment_id>
<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[mindbase21 &raquo; webcomic - Warm thoughts]]></wp:comment_author>
<wp:comment_author_email></wp:comment_author_email>
<wp:comment_author_url>http://www.mindbase21.be/webcomic-warm-thoughts/</wp:comment_author_url>

<item>
<title>News on Updates</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/12/04/news-on-updates/</link>
<pubDate>Thu, 04 Dec 2008 22:12:54 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[updates]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="updates"><![CDATA[updates]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?p=160</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>I decided to push my update schedule a bit. For the longest time I updated sporadically, then settled on 1 comic every 2 weeks. Which is sad, sad, sad. Still better than Dresden Codak*, but still… So starting now, I'll be <strong>posting weekly on Wednesday evening</strong> and maybe build a buffer in case of emergencies? yeah, I need that. If that goes well, and my writing improves, I can build it upwards from there.</p>
<p>As I mentioned in the last blogpost, I was reading ‘How to make webcomics’ and the book inspired me. Despite the title, it's not an obnoxious 'this is how you do it' manual but a nice guide. Like having a heart-to-heart with you're favorite family-member about the important things in life. Anyway, that's how it feels to me.<br />
 I've been struggling with my creative side and what career (if any) I want to build for myself. This, to those who know me, doesn't come as a surprise. Doubt is a big constant in my life. But what I do know is that I like drawing and from the multitude of areas where one use this skill, comics is the most important one to me. So it would be a shame to just let it slip. It's good excercise.</p>
<p>* don't shoot me, I'm actually a big fan of Dresden Codac</p>
]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

<item>
<title>Guestcomics: Little Gamers</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/12/06/guestcomics-little-gamers/</link>
<pubDate>Sat, 06 Dec 2008 12:26:22 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[guestcomics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="guestcomics"><![CDATA[guestcomics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[littlegamers]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="littlegamers"><![CDATA[littlegamers]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?p=168</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Welcome to the people coming in from Little Gamers! I noticed a 175% increase in visitors since they linked me in their post about guestcomics, so thanks for dropping by. It's always nice to see new people.<br />
So hey, I have a guestcomic <a href="http://www.little-gamers.com/2008/12/06/guestcomics-2/" target="_blank">on Little Gamers</a> today. <a href="http://www.little-gamers.com/2008/12/06/guestcomics-2/" target="_blank">Go check it out</a></p>
]]></content:encoded>

<title>Receipe - Cake in a mug</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/12/31/receipe-cake-in-a-mug/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 31 Dec 2008 18:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[cake]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="cake"><![CDATA[cake]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[comfort]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="comfort"><![CDATA[comfort]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[mug]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="mug"><![CDATA[mug]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[newyear]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="newyear"><![CDATA[newyear]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2008/12/31/receipe-cake-in-a-mug/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Not really a comic, but fun nonetheless. A classic receipe for cake, originally found on <a href="http://howto.wired.com/wiki/Make_Cake_in_a_Mug" target="_blank">Wired</a> and <a href="http://blog.vault9.net/food/chocolate-cake-in-5-minutes/recipe/chocolate-cake-in-5-minutes/" target="_blank">Vault9</a> but I modified it a little.
Perhaps I should add a few tips as well: don't cook it for longer than the 3 minutes and if you like experimenting, try different ingredients and shapes for the mug.]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>040 - Sell out</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/01/14/040-sell-out/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2009 18:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[happy]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="happy"><![CDATA[happy]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[sad]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="sad"><![CDATA[sad]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[sponsoring]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="sponsoring"><![CDATA[sponsoring]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/01/14/040-sell-out/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Products that offer some escape from reality will always do well, especially when times are though. And while I wouldn't want to take any of that away from anyone, I do wonder about backing an industry that makes turns a profit on the promise of helping people through hardship. Now more then ever, since <a href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/health/7263494.stm" target="_blanc">studies have shown the effects of anti-depressants to be only slightly better than of placebo pills</a>.]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>261</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-01-14 19:00:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-01-14 18:00:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>040-sell-out</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

<item>
<title>043 - Freaky Valentine</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/02/04/044-freaky-valentine/</link>

<item>
<title>Online shop</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/02/07/online-shop/</link>
<pubDate>Sat, 07 Feb 2009 13:55:51 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[dolls]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="dolls"><![CDATA[dolls]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[pluche]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="pluche"><![CDATA[pluche]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[sculpting]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="sculpting"><![CDATA[sculpting]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[shopping]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="shopping"><![CDATA[shopping]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?p=291</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/shop" target="_blank"><img src='http://www.mindbase21.be/wp-content/gallery/blog/blogbanner_01.jpg' alt='blogbanner_01.jpg' class='ngg-singlepic ngg-center' /></a>
Remember <a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/siamese-twin-dolls-and-more/" target="_blank">those dolls I make</a>? They're starting to take up too much space in my little studio apartment. And since throwing them at people on the street proved to give too much trouble (you hit one little kid and all hell breaks loose, sheesh), I've set up an online shop.
<a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/shop">Get them right here.</a>

EDIT:
I've moved the dolls over to <a href="mindbase21.etsy.com" target="_blank">my Etsy store.</a>]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>044 - Little garden of horrors</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/02/11/044-little-garden-of-horrors/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 11 Feb 2009 11:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[bear]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="bear"><![CDATA[bear]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[carnivorous]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="carnivorous"><![CDATA[carnivorous]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[cute]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="cute"><![CDATA[cute]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[eaten]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="eaten"><![CDATA[eaten]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[flower]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="flower"><![CDATA[flower]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[horror]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="horror"><![CDATA[horror]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/02/11/044-little-garden-of-horrors/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[A bit of cuteness in anticipation for Valentine's Day. I'm still practicing and experimenting with the Wacom, this time I did the inks in Flash. A fun little experiment. The brush handled better than in Photoshop, but I'm not entirely happy with the shape of the strokes. More practive needed I guess.

The bear character is actually one of the dolls I've been making the last few months. See them in <a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/shop" target="_blank">the shop</a>.]]></content:encoded>

<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[For this comic, I went back to working with technical pens because the inks I did in Flash were awful. So I actually made this comic 1 and a half times, just for you. That's how much I care. Now go and spread the gospel of my comic! Thank you.]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>047 - Wormholes</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/03/04/047-wormholes/</link>
<pubDate>Tue, 03 Mar 2009 23:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[chickens]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="chickens"><![CDATA[chickens]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[wormholes]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="wormholes"><![CDATA[wormholes]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/03/04/047-wormholes/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[As pointed out several times by Scott McCloud in the past and more recently by Yves Bigerel (Balak01 on DeviantArt), the possiblilities for digital comics are widely underused. This is only a little scrolling-experiment but it did give me some insight on the relation between time and movement. Well worth looking furter into when I find some time, I think.

Meanwhile, check out Balak01's work <a href="http://balak01.deviantart.com/art/about-DIGITAL-COMICS-111966969" target="_blank">here</a> and <a href="http://balak01.deviantart.com/art/ABOUt-about-DIGITAL-COMICS-112523191" target="_blank">here</a>]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

<item>
<title>049 - Freefalling</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/03/18/049-freefalling/</link>
<pubDate>Tue, 17 Mar 2009 23:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[dragon]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="dragon"><![CDATA[dragon]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/03/18/049-freefalling/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Give this one a little time, it takes a while to load. I've probably reached the limit of the “continuing image”-format, with its 15000 px height. A nice experiment, but you have to be weary of file-sizes and load-time.]]></content:encoded>

<title>Filler</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/03/25/filler-3/</link>
<pubDate>Tue, 24 Mar 2009 23:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[fire]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="fire"><![CDATA[fire]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[redesign]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="redesign"><![CDATA[redesign]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/03/25/filler-3/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Okay, so no real comic today because I put my creative energy into redesigning the site. Is it megalomaniac enough? I can never tell.
For those interested, the theme is<a href="http://comicpress.org/" target="_blank"> comicpress 2.7</a> but I customized it to my design. More tweaks to follow, I'm sure. I'm looking forward to exploring the storyline-features and of course the transcripts are a nice addition.]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>050 - April fool</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/01/050-april-fool/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 01 Apr 2009 09:59:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[aprilfoulsday]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="aprilfoulsday"><![CDATA[aprilfoulsday]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[crisis]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="crisis"><![CDATA[crisis]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[economy]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="economy"><![CDATA[economy]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[humour]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="humour"><![CDATA[humour]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/01/050-april-fool/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Another 4 people got fired at my job last week. Needless to say, morale is low. So today's comic is more or less in honour of the colleages and people feeling screwed over or kicked while they're down. A lot of blame has been assigned already and there's a lot of anger and frustration, but also sympathy and humour. That said, this year's April Fool's Day wouldn't be complete without some twisted irony and sarcasm. No one said humour should be funny all the time.]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>308</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-04-01 10:59:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-04-01 09:59:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>050-april-fool</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>hovertext</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>Economic downfall is funny for everyone except people.</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>I know you all worry about your jobs, but things are looking up!
Hahahahahaha!!!
April's fool
Now who wants to wash my car before packing?</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<item>
<title>051 - New Hair Day</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/08/051-new-hair-day/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 08 Apr 2009 10:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[demons]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="demons"><![CDATA[demons]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[hair]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="hair"><![CDATA[hair]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[haircut]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="haircut"><![CDATA[haircut]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/08/051-new-hair-day/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[I'll miss the voices telling me to burn things though. <a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2007/03/22/something-missing/">Powers of sarcasm are still going strong</a>]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>310</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-04-08 12:00:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-04-08 10:00:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>051-new-hair-day</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>Hssss! Burrrrn! Yessss!
No! Demonhair infestation!
Hssss!
Escape! Delete!
Hairbusters
Yes! That's it!
Ting!
Much Better.
And that's why I got the haircut!
Pfft! Lamest story ever!
Hssss!</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<item>
<title>052 - Calling Backup</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/15/052-calling-backup/</link>
<pubDate>Tue, 14 Apr 2009 22:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[backup]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="backup"><![CDATA[backup]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[madness]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="madness"><![CDATA[madness]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/15/052-calling-backup/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>320</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-04-15 00:00:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-04-14 22:00:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>052-calling-backup</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>hovertext</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>Introducing D’Arcy</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>Captain Dramatic, over here, is having his latest descent into madness. That means I‘ll be taking over for today.
We‘re all gonna die…
Riiiiight, So let‘s just see what we‘ve got to work with.
… That‘s some screwed up imagination.
Seriously, doll, no bathroom?</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:comment>
<wp:comment_id>2126</wp:comment_id>

<item>
<title>053 - Please Hold</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/22/053-please-hold/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 22 Apr 2009 09:59:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[calling]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="calling"><![CDATA[calling]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[danger]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="danger"><![CDATA[danger]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[insane]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="insane"><![CDATA[insane]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[phone]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="phone"><![CDATA[phone]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/22/053-please-hold/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>321</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-04-22 11:59:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-04-22 09:59:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>053-please-hold</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>hovertext</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>I hate making phone calls</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>You just be nice to the doctors, alright?
Moving on to more urgent matters.
Slam!
Hi' I'd like to talk to the president, please…
No, I will not hold.
I'm sure he's a busy man, but you might want to take a look out side and patch me through anyway.
Ahahahahah!!
…Insane? Well, obviously. Last time you had me on hold, I had to listen to Enya for 15 minutes.</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>322</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-04-29 11:59:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-04-29 09:59:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>054-restraint</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>hovertext</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>Sleeeepy</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>The good news is that I got my refund on that horrible shampoo, bad news: I left the death ray on, so you‘ll have to get some new batteries for the thing.
Glad to hear you had a good time.
Now get me out of here!
Oooh, sorry, gotta run. I‘m Meeting some friends for drinks in 10 minutes!
Oookay, Take it easy now. Time for a  little shot.
Wait!!!
I‘ll get you for this D‘Arcy!
Noooooo…zzzzzz!</wp:meta_value>

<title>055 - Home Sweet Home</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/05/06/055-home-sweet-home/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 06 May 2009 10:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/05/06/055-home-sweet-home/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Still confused? Start from <a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/15/052-calling-backup/">the beginning</a> of this storyline.]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>323</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-05-06 12:00:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-05-06 10:00:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>055-home-sweet-home</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>1</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>_edit_lock</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>1242073215</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>D‘Arcy! Revenge is at the door, with a side order of pain!
… Hello? Anyone?
Good, you‘re home! I do have things to do besides house sitting.
But… My revenge!
Well that just didn‘t feel right.</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<title>056 - Giants</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/05/13/056-giants/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 13 May 2009 09:59:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[couch]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="couch"><![CDATA[couch]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[fist]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="fist"><![CDATA[fist]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[giants]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="giants"><![CDATA[giants]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/05/13/056-giants/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[And so concludes this story-arc. I'm on holiday next week, so it's a rather fitting ending I think. Not sure yet if I'll post a comic or make a special pin-up, so you'll just have to come back next week!
Still confused? <a href="http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/04/15/052-calling-backup/">Maybe you could read it from the beginning.</a>]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>326</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-05-13 11:59:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-05-13 09:59:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>056-giants</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>Look Frank, She broke your porcelain chicken, I get that. But throwing a tantrum isn‘t gonna help.
I‘ll have her pay for it.
I‘ve had it with trans-dimensional giants and other nonsense!
I‘m not moving from this couch for at least a week, people!
The End</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<item>
<title>Filler</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/05/20/filler-4/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 20 May 2009 09:59:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[filler]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="filler"><![CDATA[filler]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[holiday]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="holiday"><![CDATA[holiday]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/05/20/filler-4/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[I'm on holiday this week, so I provided some filler art. In addition, here's some guestcomics I've done for <a href="http://unrehearsedriot.com/2009/05/04/guest-strip-rembrand-le-compte/" target="_blank">Unrehearsed Riot</a> and <a href="http://unconsciousink.com/inklings/parasquid-guest-by-rembrand-le-compte/" target="_blank">Unconcious Ink</a>. Both of which are awesome collegues of mine at <a href="http://www.tnppress.com" target="_blank">TNPPress</a>.
Rest assured, I'm not spending all my time reading in vast plain of nothingness. Time off always seems to lead to ‘time to finish this and that’, am I right? 
I'll see you next week with a proper comic. In the meantime, check out <a href="http://www.tnppress.com">tnppress.com</a> for some other great webcomics.]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>057 - Doctor in the house</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/05/27/057-doctor-in-the-house/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 27 May 2009 09:59:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[doctorwho]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="doctorwho"><![CDATA[doctorwho]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[scifi]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="scifi"><![CDATA[scifi]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/05/27/057-doctor-in-the-house/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[I pity the fool who dislikes The Doctor! Also, we here at <a target="_blank" href="http://www.tnppress.com">TNPPress</a> have got another new member in our mids. Say hello to <a target="_blanc" href="http://www.nerfthiscomic.com/">Nerf this comic</a>!]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>330</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-05-27 11:59:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-05-27 09:59:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>057-doctor-in-the-house</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>What the hell?
Good Lord! It‘s the Doctor!
Sorry to bother you, my good man, but you wouldn‘t have some string and a roll of tape laying around now, would you?
Sure! What do you need it for? Making an ingenious device, no doubt! Perhaps for tracking rips in the fabric of time itself!
Actually, no. I was trying to fix the water cooker so I can make some Languarian tea…
Oh…</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<item>
<title>058 - emptiness</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/06/03/058-emptiness/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 03 Jun 2009 09:59:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[batman]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="batman"><![CDATA[batman]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[food]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="food"><![CDATA[food]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/06/03/058-emptiness/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>332</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-06-03 11:59:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-06-03 09:59:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>058-emptiness</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>The dark veil of night covers my city…
A feeling of emptiness comes over me…
There! Movement from my target!
My sense of purpose returns. I’ll feel complete once more.
I’ll have a Bigburger and fries please.Oh, and a large coke.</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<item>
<title>059 - Religious awakenings</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/06/10/059-religious-awakenings/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 10 Jun 2009 09:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/06/10/059-religious-awakenings/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Religion is a fascinating phenomenon to me. A few people in my life have tried their best to find purpose through it, with varying succes. This search for a purpose puzzles me. Cults, Eastern teachings, Western religions, New Age nonsense … it's quite the list. But I left ‘faith’ behind me around the time I stopped believing in Santa and the Easter Bunny.  I get more satisfaction from logic and discussion. Also, I've never been much of a group person, so the mandatory meeting of people every Friday, Saturday or Sunday is out of the question anyway. 

I'm reading ‘The God Delusion‘, by Richard Dawkins and enjoying it very much. I'd recommend it to anyone interested in religion. And if you're not much of a reader, there's always <a target="_blank" href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9WQ0i3nCx60&feature=PlayList&p=B1C425D6FDC2E0C0&index=9">Christopher Hitchins' piece about Mother Theresa</a> on YouTube. If you like your holy houses steamrolled.

<strong>Edit:</strong>
I've made a topic <a target="_blank" href="http://forums.tnppress.com/viewtopic.php?f=13&t=214&start=0">in the forums</a> if anyone wants to share his views.]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>342</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-06-10 11:00:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-06-10 09:00:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>059-religious-awakenings</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>What’sthe freaking point, in the end?
It’s likebeing stabbed with a 1000 tiny daggers. 
I can’t keep dealing with this stuff, Man. it’s getting to me.
Well, there’s always religion.
Would you gentlemen like a free ice cream sample?
Woohoo!All hail free food! </wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>hovertext</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>In Food we Trust</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>_edit_lock</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>1244674359</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>

</wp:postmeta>
<wp:comment>
<wp:comment_id>2294</wp:comment_id>
<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[Ian R. Taylor]]></wp:comment_author>
<wp:comment_author_email>unrehearsedriot@gmail.com</wp:comment_author_email>
<wp:comment_author_url>http://unrehearsedriot.com</wp:comment_author_url>
<wp:comment_author_IP>24.58.158.27</wp:comment_author_IP>
<wp:comment_date>2009-06-10 23:25:35</wp:comment_date>
<wp:comment_date_gmt>2009-06-10 21:25:35</wp:comment_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Although I haven't read "The G-d Delusion," it's pretty easy to refute his arguments as stated on wikipedia.  Not to start one of those passionate debates whereby we both pointlessly shout at each other, but consider the following:

In reality, it's impossible (as of now) to disprove G-d.  If it were possible, this wouldn't be an issue.  Ultimately, for every argument against G-d, there's an equally valid argument for G-d.  If you actually want to maturely debate this, I can give you a few.  Essentially what it boils down to is this: atheism is simply another religion where you worship human observation (science).  At the core of it, since there's no surefire way to disprove G-d, you're operating on the basis of faith with evidence, and that my friend is religion.

Don't take this as me trying to proselytize you, I don't do that.  I don't even consider myself a creationist at this point.  But hopefully, this will make you be objective, and you'll realize that you've put your faith in something, and though you've put faith in logic, faith is by definition not logical.  Basically, I'm just saying don't turn into one of those atheist jerks who insists that they're right without really giving the issue some serious thought.       

oh wait, you did a comic too!  good job hahahaha!]]></wp:comment_content>

<wp:comment>
<wp:comment_id>2303</wp:comment_id>
<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[Ian R. Taylor]]></wp:comment_author>
<wp:comment_author_email>unrehearsedriot@gmail.com</wp:comment_author_email>
<wp:comment_author_url>http://unrehearsedriot.com</wp:comment_author_url>
<wp:comment_author_IP>24.58.158.27</wp:comment_author_IP>
<wp:comment_date>2009-06-14 21:48:41</wp:comment_date>
<wp:comment_date_gmt>2009-06-14 19:48:41</wp:comment_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[sweet!]]></wp:comment_content>
<wp:comment_approved>1</wp:comment_approved>
<wp:comment_type></wp:comment_type>
<wp:comment_parent>2295</wp:comment_parent>
<wp:comment_user_id>0</wp:comment_user_id>
</wp:comment>
<wp:comment>
<wp:comment_id>2295</wp:comment_id>
<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></wp:comment_author>
<wp:comment_author_email>rembrand.lecompte@mindbase21.be</wp:comment_author_email>
<wp:comment_author_url>http://www.mindbase21.be</wp:comment_author_url>
<wp:comment_author_IP>84.198.252.222</wp:comment_author_IP>
<wp:comment_date>2009-06-11 00:50:09</wp:comment_date>
<wp:comment_date_gmt>2009-06-10 22:50:09</wp:comment_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Ah, some life in the comments! Hooray!
No worries, I'm not going to gonna put down anyone because they're religious. I'd like to point out though that you're assuming that I haven't given the other point of view any serious thought. But I have. One of my friends is an adamant Catholic, I've talked to Jehova's Witnesses and Protestants and it's given us great discussions.
You say it's easy to refute Dawkins' arguments, and from religious viewpoint a lot probably are. I just fear we have a different view on what logic, faith and religion are.  And so we'll probably never agree. Half the time it's like comparing apples to oranges. But that's alright by me as long as we can make sense of the world and each other.

On the fact that you can't disprove the existence of God, I agree. But you can't prove it either. It's the “What is more likely?”-argument.
Science and logic aren't a religion as far as I'm concerned, and neither is atheism. It's the opposite. It's not about worship, it is about what is more likely to be, considering the facts at hand. Science isn't just about human observation anymore (e.g. quantum mechanics is pure math). Logic is the way the brain and the universe work because it can be proven time and time again that it's a solid base to work with. Everything after that is in a constant state of doubt and "what is more likely at this point". No faith involved. I've heard your argument about "trust in logic = faith" before but I could honestly never see that. 

So, to me, science and logic make sense on their own, is open for critisism, it can change, you can build on it, … Just like religion, it will offer an explanation but it can be challenged and it evolves quickly.  You've got a hypothesis (= basic assumption) which is either backed by facts or not. If it isn't, you throw it away. If it is, you can build on it.
While the religions, in my eyes, are largly static (dogmas, ancient texts and such), not open for critisism by the outside but can change to fit the needs of the interpreter (priest, head of church, …). 

I made a topic on forums.tnppress.com in the general section. Cause the comments section isn't the best place for loooong posts. :p]]></wp:comment_content>
<wp:comment_approved>1</wp:comment_approved>
<wp:comment_type></wp:comment_type>
<wp:comment_parent>0</wp:comment_parent>
<wp:comment_user_id>1</wp:comment_user_id>
</wp:comment>

<item>
<title>060 - Inked up</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/06/17/060-inked-up/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jun 2009 09:45:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/06/17/060-inked-up/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Tattoos have a reputation of being tags for all kinds of bad people, ranging from pirates to gangs. But they're also art or even ways to show devotion, in other cultures.
I'm in the market for getting a good tattoo, but being in a constant state of confusion, I'm worried about the result. I want something that I can still look at 10 years from now and go “awesome!”.
Freaky coincidence, but this story made headlines today:<a target="_blank" href="http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/worldnews/article-1193384/Teen-suing-tattoo-artist-8-500-asked-stars-face--ended-56.html"> Girl asked for 3 stars and got 56 on her face</a>.
I'd like to open up the floor to your experiences with getting a tattoo. Got any pictures or opinions on them? Feel free to share.
Leave it in the comments, or even better,<a href="http://forums.tnppress.com/viewtopic.php?f=34&t=224" target="_blank"> check out the forum</a>.

In other news, fellow TNP artist Evan Diaz rebooted his webcomic last Monday. Adjust your Musings-bookmark and welcome <a href="http://pajamaforest.com/" target="_blank">Pajama Forest</a>!]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>348</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-06-17 11:45:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-06-17 09:45:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>060-inked-up</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
<wp:postmeta>
<wp:meta_key>transcript</wp:meta_key>
<wp:meta_value>Tattoos are awesome
But it‘s tough deciding on getting something that‘ll stay with you forever
You’ll still have to  agree with it years from now, when you could be someone completely different
Designing one myself makes it even harder
Inspiration
So I started a sketchbook collecting examples
Show me yours?</wp:meta_value>
</wp:postmeta>

<item>
<title>061 - Angry old man 01</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/06/24/061-angry-old-man-01/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 24 Jun 2009 14:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[angry]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="angry"><![CDATA[angry]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[old]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="old"><![CDATA[old]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/06/24/061-angry-old-man-01/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[It’s my destiny to be an angry old bastard when I'm 70 or 80 years old. And I’ll enjoy it to the fullest!

On Sunday I launched my brandnew <a href="store.tnppress.com/mci-shop/" target="_blank">shop</a> over at TNP Press. The first product is an awesome button pack featuring artwork from the comic. And because I know you’re all cheap bastards,<strong> I’m giving some away for free!</strong> The first 5 people* in the comments or replying to me on <a href="http://www.twitter.com/mindbase21" target="_blank">twitter</a> get a pack. Ready? Set… Go!

<small>* excluding spambots, dead presidents<del datetime="2009-06-24T14:33:19+00:00"> and fellow TNP members</del>, including TNP members</small>]]></content:encoded>

The new TNP shop launched last week, so I've put up a little teaser in the right-sidebar for you to click and get some goodies. It's buttons for now, and I'll think about adding some tshirts later on.
<a href="http://mindbase21.etsy.com/">My Etsy store</a> will continue to carry all handmade items, like the dolls.]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>062 - Fired</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/07/01/062-fired/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 01 Jul 2009 14:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[canned]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="canned"><![CDATA[canned]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[fire]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="fire"><![CDATA[fire]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[terminated]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="terminated"><![CDATA[terminated]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[termination]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="termination"><![CDATA[termination]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/07/01/062-fired/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[It’s never quite like in the movies, is it? Although I’m glad not to have been set on fire, I am a little disappointed by the way my termination was handled last Thursday. Not even a small riot or a shout. Oh well.
What are your experiences with being canned? Did you burn a couple of bridges on the way out or are you still pals with your old bosses? Are you seething with rage over ‘The state of the economy’ being used as a cover-up for mismanagement? Leave your remarks in the comments below, or take it to <a target="_blank" href="forums.tnppress.com/">the forum</a>. ]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>365</wp:post_id>

<wp:comment>
<wp:comment_id>2350</wp:comment_id>
<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[Daniel J. Olson]]></wp:comment_author>
<wp:comment_author_email>frozencactus@hotmail.com</wp:comment_author_email>
<wp:comment_author_url>http://www.bewilderedkid.com</wp:comment_author_url>
<wp:comment_author_IP>64.122.82.178</wp:comment_author_IP>
<wp:comment_date>2009-07-08 16:37:03</wp:comment_date>
<wp:comment_date_gmt>2009-07-08 14:37:03</wp:comment_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Sorry to hear that man. I've never been fired, I've quit every job I've ever had. I HAVE had to fire people though, which is one of the worst feelings in the world. The last job I had I did a lot of firing. I was a regional manager for a local chain of bookstores the whole situation ended very poorly. The owner ended up getting into heavy drugs and defaulted on loans. It fell into receivership and I quit shortly thereafter. The thing that really blows is that the bookstores had been open for nearly 100 years.]]></wp:comment_content>

Obviously I expect the horde of fans to follow me there and become a fan of <a target="_blank" href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/My-Chronic-Insomnia/99008995821">My Chronic Insomnia on Facebook.</a>
Now If you’ll excuse me, I’m going to face the heatwave outside and try to find something to drink before I passout.]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>Updates</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/07/19/updates/</link>
<pubDate>Sun, 19 Jul 2009 12:53:35 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?p=371</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[An overview of what’s been going on lately. Some I already mentioned in passing when updating comics, but really it makes more sense to group it into a post.
<ul><li>As you all know, I’m sure, we’ve got <a href="http://forums.tnppress.com" target="_blank">an awesome forum</a> at TNP Press where you can share your thoughts on everything from antlers to zootropes (link in the navigation bar). And now every comic got it’s own special forum.  Including <a href="http://forums.tnppress.com/viewforum.php?f=41" target="_blank">My Chronic Insomnia!</a> <a href="http://forums.tnppress.com/viewforum.php?f=41" target="_blank">Go forth and post</a> thy twisted thoughts and share opinions with likeminded individuals!</li><li>If you’re on Facebook (like all the cool kids and the hip elderly), become a fan of <a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/My-Chronic-Insomnia/99008995821" target="_blank">the MCI Fanpage</a>. <br />On twitter, you can now follow <a href="http://www.twitter.com/mci_comics" target="_blank">@mci_comics</a> for news and updates on the comic.</li><li>I’m working on a whole new website and online identity. Not just the comic site, but my whole portfolio will get a make-over this summer. I want it to be more profesional, memorable and creative than ‘mindbase21’. Especially for new people to come visit and explore. </li><li>Lastly, the obligatory sales-pitch (it pays for my hosting): get your awesome buttons <a href="http://store.tnppress.com/mci-shop/" target="_blank">in the shop</a>. 5 buttons for $7, that includes shipping.</li>]]></content:encoded>

<wp:post_name>updates</wp:post_name>

<item>
<title>Calling guest artists</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/07/26/calling-guest-artists/</link>
<pubDate>Sun, 26 Jul 2009 21:00:59 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[News]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="news"><![CDATA[News]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/?p=384</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Oh, I know what you're thinking:<em> “Didn't you just get fired? You must have plenty of time!” “And don’t you make a weekly comic anyway? That’s 7 days to finish 6 panels, you lazy bastard!”</em>

Hey now! That’s very insensitive of you! I’m in a fragile state right now and I might start crying! Alas, I'm not leaving The Job until October and I'm in the middle of other exciting creative things at the moment! Including packing to move to another apartment soon.

So some <strong>guestcomics or pinups</strong> would really come in handy. You can post a reply and I'll give you my e-mail address if you’re interested.
I'd like to have a first piece to post by<strong> Tuesday, August 4th</strong> <em>–So close by, I’m very sorry–</em> but you can keep sending stuff in <strong>until August 25th</strong> to have the month covered.
Internet fame awaits you, don't be shy!]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
