<item>
<title>Live Art</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/08/12/live-art/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 12 Aug 2009 14:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[coffee]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="coffee"><![CDATA[coffee]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/08/12/live-art/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Something special this week. Here's a couple of pictures of 2 posters I made last Monday, as part of a <a href="http://ingliveart.blogspot.com" target="_blank">Live Art project (click to open)</a>. Every Monday from July to September, a guest-artist is invited to make 2 advertising posters in Antwerps Central Station and I got to be a part of that. Despite the cramp in my elbow, it was a great experience. It's the first time I did almost-lifesize art (the posters are 1.80m high) and I'm rather pleased with the result.
Here's a couple of better pictures of the day: <a target="_blank" href="http://ingliveart.blogspot.com/2009/08/verslag-week-5-mindbase21-klik-hier.html">ingliveart.blogspot.com</a>]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
<wp:post_id>395</wp:post_id>
<wp:post_date>2009-08-12 16:00:00</wp:post_date>
<wp:post_date_gmt>2009-08-12 14:00:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
<wp:post_name>live-art</wp:post_name>
<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

<item>
<title>Packing the last boxes</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/08/19/packing-the-last-boxes/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 19 Aug 2009 14:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="tag"><![CDATA[moving]]></category>

		<category domain="tag" nicename="moving"><![CDATA[moving]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/08/19/packing-the-last-boxes/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[We're almost at the end of the filler-art, I promise. I just packed the last of my things and I'm moving everything this weekend. That means next week will be the last filler-filled post! Normal comics service will resume on the 2nd of September. Around that time I'll also relaunch my main site (mindbase21.be) with a new look and name. It's goint to be great!
Thanks for sticking around people!]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>Unpacking</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/08/26/unpacking/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 26 Aug 2009 12:50:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/08/26/unpacking/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Here's a picture of how I feel right now. Moving is hard work, my arms still hurt from carrying boxes 3 floors down and 2 floors up. And unpacking isn't much better either. But everything is almost over now. I'm getting my internet connection set up next Monday and I need to get some furniture, after that I'm all set.
Next week I might have to do another filler, but after that we're back in full force!]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

<item>
<title>064 - Beardo</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/09/02/064-beardo/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 02 Sep 2009 14:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/09/02/064-beardo/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Aaaaaand we're back! The heavy lifting is over and my internet connection is active, so I'll be posting some actual comics again. And to prove I've also been busy with other projects, here's my new portfolio: <a href="http://www.paperblackninja.com" target="_blank">PaperblackNinja</a> and some pictures of the live action painting thing I did a couple weeks back: <a href="http://ingliveart.blogspot.com/2009/08/verslag-week-5-mindbase21-klik-hier.html" target="_blank">Painting</a>

This week's installment is about beards. Mainly because I'm growing one.

Enjoy!]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>065 - Tough love</title>
<link>http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/09/09/065-tough-love/</link>
<pubDate>Wed, 09 Sep 2009 14:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rembrand]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

		<category domain="category" nicename="comics"><![CDATA[Comics]]></category>

<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.mindbase21.be/comics/2009/09/09/065-tough-love/</guid>
<description></description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[Getting along with vending machines is a tricky thing. They are fickle and sometimes just plain dishonest, just taking everything you can give but giving nothing in return.

You may have seen or heard that last week's comic was featured in a post on <a href="http://www.beardrevue.com/2009/09/5-stages-of-growing-beard.html" target="_blank">Beardrevue.com</a>, which I find great because I'm a big fan of the site. It's a great place to browse for all things beard-related, from featured bearded art(ists) to stories, to getting your hands on bearded products. If you haven't been there, I highly recommend taking a look. There's even a place for the bald-chinned and unmoustached individual, as you can buy your very own classy substitute.

So, a warm welcome to the folks coming in from <a href="http://www.beardrevue.com/" target="_blank">Beardrevue.com</a>, hope you like some of the other comics as well!
]]></content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
